Package com.github.dm.jrt.core.util

Utility classes definitions.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Backoff
    Interface defining a backoff policy, returning a delay in milliseconds to apply when a counter exceeds a specified limit.
    UnitDuration.Condition
    Interface defining a condition to check.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Backoffs
    Backoff utility class.
    Backoffs.BaseBackoff
    Base backoff policy implementation.
    Backoffs.ConstantBackoff
    Constant backoff policy.
    ClassToken<TYPE>
    Utility abstract class used to work around Java type erasure.
    ConstantConditions
    Utility class for verifying constant conditions.
    DeepEqualObject
    Base abstract class providing a default implementation of equals(), hashCode() and toString() based on the list of objects passed as the constructor arguments.
    Reflection
    Reflection utility class.
    SimpleQueue<E>
    Minimal implementation of a light-weight queue storing elements into dynamically increasing circular buffer.
    UnitDuration
    Utility class for handling a time duration in different time units.
    UnitTime
    Utility class for handling time in different time units.
    WeakIdentityHashMap<K,V>
    Map implementation combining the features of IdentityHashMap and WeakHashMap.

Package com.github.dm.jrt.core.util Description

Utility classes definitions.

Created by davide-maestroni on 09/25/2014.
